greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: If A327928(n) is zero, a(n) = A003415(n), otherwise a(n) = A327859(n) = A276086(A003415(n)).
comment: After zero, sequence contains only terms of A048103.
Note that there are fixed points, like a(15) = 15.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1728
Antti Karttunen, Data supplement: n, a(n) computed for n = 1..65537
program: A276086(n) = { my(i=0,m=1,pr=1,nextpr); while((n>0),i=i+1; nextpr = prime(i)*pr; if((n%nextpr),m*=(prime(i)^((n%nextpr)/pr));n-=(n%nextpr));pr=nextpr); m; };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 07 2019
